page.title: 17TRANSPORT
page.content: {TRANSPORT}We travel around mostly in cars.The cars run on petrol.There are three grades of petrol two,three and four star.Different cars go on different types.The car manufactures are Ford,Vauxhall and British Leyland.Most cars are not automatic.In Coggeshall we have one bus service which runs from Coggeshall to Colchster.but there is a Community bus that takes people where the bus doesn't go.There isn't a railway in Coggeshall, the nearest is in Kelvedon.All the goods are delivered by lorries. To prevent lorries coming through Coggeshall a Bypass was built A motor_bike is a petrol powered bicycle.Yamaha and Suzuki are popular motor_bikes. Most children have bikes. BMX's are the most popular. There are also racers and leisure bikes.
